definition: Hailar district, Mongolian Xailar raion, of Hulunbuir city 呼倫貝爾市|呼伦贝尔市[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou
Hailar district, Mongolian Xailar raion, of Hulunbuir city 呼倫貝爾市|呼伦贝尔市[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: There is a railway station in Hailar and the trains travel pass the grassland.
sentences.chinese: 海拉尔市有火车站，所以草原上会有火车经过。

sentences.english: Hailar Basin is a meso-cenozoic of multicycle, composite-style, fault-sag basin.
sentences.chinese: 海拉尔盆地是一个中新生代多旋回复杂叠合盆地。

sentences.english: In Hailar City the focus has been placed on rectifying the problem of low work efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 在海拉尔市，重点抓了办事效率低的整顿问题。
